item.title: A2F Importer
item.description:
Introducing A2F Importer, a solution to streamline your workflow and enhance your creative capabilities within Autodesk Maya. Integrated with the latest Audio2Face technology at SenseTime, this powerful plugin can generate and import excellent facial animation driven by audio. With the feedback of experienced animators, this plugin provides advanced features that cater to artists at every level - from beginners to experts.

With A2F Importer, you can expect seamless integration into your existing pipeline to drive facial performance, saving precious time on repetitive tasks while enabling you to focus on what matters most – creating emotional performance. Whether it’s facial data provided by our Audio2Face technology, facial capture data, or generated data from different methods, our plugin offers a universal availability to meet your needs.

Our user-friendly interface ensures ease of use, allowing users to learn and adapt to its functionalities quickly. Plus, A2F Importer is compatibe with both the 2018+ (Python 2.x) and 2022+ (Python 3.x) versions of Maya.

Facilitate your experience with facial animation in Maya today!

My contributions to this project are:

  • Plugin development and testing.
  • Tutorial and demo.

item.title: Who Drank My Milk Tea! - MaoXiaoJiu
item.description:
Welcome to AR - MaoXiaoJiu, an innovative mobile application that leverages Augmented Reality technology to provide you with a novel visual experience and interactivity fun. With AR - MaoXiaoJiu, you can see our virtual characters - MaoXiaojiu - jump around and play in your Real-world environment like they’re right beside you.

This project attempts to merge the virtual with reality and enrich user experiences with Augmented Reality. It is also a test of the USD pipeline in Apple ARKit that all assets (characters and animations) used in this project are in USD format.

My contributions to this project are:

  • Project coordination.
  • Full stack development.
  • Implement USD pipeline in ARKit, Maya, and Houdini.

item.title: MMD4Maya
item.description:
MMD4Maya is a Maya plugin which use for importing pmx/pmd model to Maya. It is originally forked from gameboy12615, and is based on pmx2fbx.exe wrote by Stereoarts.

This plugin has been applied in the producation of dancing videos in SiTuXiaoTao Series and BaiMianMian Series.

My contributions to this project are:

  • Bug-fix and add support for Japanese or Chinese support.
  • Develop a universal version for Maya 2018+ (Python 2.x) and Maya 2022+ (Python 3.x)
